Verses: 1 akkaalaththil Naakaas Ennum Ammoniyan Vandhu, Keeleyaaththilirukkira Yaapesai Mutrikkaipottaan; Appozhudhu Yaapesin Manushar Ellaarum Naakaasai Nokki: Engalote Utanpatikkaipannum; Appozhudhu Ummaich Chevippom Endraarkal.
2 adharku Ammoniyanaakiya Naakaas: Naan Ungal Ovvoruvarutaiya Valadhu Kannaiyum Pitungi, Idhinaale Isravel Ellaavatrin Melum Nindhaivarappannuvadhe Naan Ungalote Pannum Utanpatikkai Endraan.

3 adharku Yaapesin Moopparkal: Naangal Isravel Naatengum Sdhaanaapadhikalai Anuppumpati, Ezhunaal Engalukkuth Thavanaikotum, Engalai Ratchippaar Illaavittaal, Appozhudhu Ummitaththil Varuvom Endraarkal.
4 andha Sdhaanaapadhikal Savulin Ooraakiya Kipiyaavile Vandhu, Janangalin Kaadhuketka Andhach Cheydhikalaich Chonnaarkal; Appozhudhu Janangalellaarum Saththamittu Azhudhaarkal.
5 idho, Savul Maatukalin Pinnaale Vayalilirundhu Vandhu, Janangal Azhukira Mukaandharam Enna Endru Kettaan; Yaapesin Manushar Solliya Seydhikalai Avanukkuth Theriviththaarkal.
6 savul Indhach Cheydhikalaik Kettavutane, Thevanutaiya Aavi Avanmel Iranginadhinaal Avan Mikavum Kopam Moontavanaaki,

7 orinaimaattaip Pitiththu, Thuntiththu, Andha Sdhaanaapadhikal Kaiyile Kotuththu, Isravelin Naatukalukkellaam Anuppi: Savulin Pinnaaleyum, Saamuvelin Pinnaaleyum Purappataadhavan Evano, Avanutaiya Maatukalukku Ippatich Cheyyappatum Endru Solliyanuppinaan; Appozhudhu Karththaraaluntaana Payangaram Janaththinmel Vandhadhinaal, Orumanappattup Purappattu Vandhaarkal.
8 avarkalaip Pesekkile Ilakkam Paarththaan; Isravel Puththiraril Moondrulatchamperum, Yoodhaa Manusharil Muppadhinaayiramperum Irundhaarkal.

9 vandha Sdhaanaapadhikalai Avarkal Nokki: Naalaikku Veyil Erukiradharku Munne Ungalukku Ratchippuk Kitaikkum Endru Keeleyaaththilirukkira Yaapesin Manusharukkuch Chollungal Endraarkal; Sdhaanaapadhikal Vandhu Yaapesin Manusharitaththil Adhai Ariviththaarkal; Adharku Avarkal Sandhoshappattaarkal.
10 pinpu Yaapesin Manushar: Naalaikku Ungalitaththil Varuvom, Appozhudhu Ungal Ishtappatiyellaam Engalukkuch Cheyyungal Endraarkal.

11 marunaalile Savul Janangalai Moondru Pataiyaaka Vakuththu, Kizhakku Veluththuvarum Jaamaththil Paalayaththirkul Vandhu Veyil Erumvaraikkum Ammoniyarai Muriya Atiththaan; Thappinavarkalil Irantuperaakilum Serndhu Otippokaadhapati Ellaarum Sidharip Ponaarkal.
12 appozhudhu Janangal Saamuvelai Nokki: Savulaa Namakku Raajaavaayirukkappokiravan Endru Sonnavarkal Yaar? Andha Manusharai Naangal Kondru Potumpatikku Oppukkotungal Endraarkal.
13 adharkuch Chavul: Indraiyadhinam Oruvarum Kollappatalaakaadhu; Indru Karththar Isravelukku Iratchippai Arulinaar Endraan.
14 appozhudhu Saamuvel Janangalai Nokki: Naam Kilkaalukkup Poi, Ange Raajyapaaraththai Sdhirappatuththuvom Vaarungal Endraan.

15 appatiye Janangal Ellaarum Kilkaalukkup Poi, Avvitaththile Karththarutaiya Sannidhiyil Savulai Raajaavaaka Erpatuththi, Ange Karththarutaiyasannidhiyil Samaadhaanapalikalaich Cheluththi, Ange Savulum Isravel Manushar Yaavarum Mikavum Sandhoshangontaatinaarkal.
